item.title: Letters of Recommendation
item.description: If you would like for me to write you a letter of recommendation, and are not able to find me in person to request it, please send me an email request prior to filling out the below information. Please describe in at most 1 paragraph why you think I will be able to write you a good letter of recommendation, what the recommendation is for, and a rough idea of when the deadline(s) will be.
